domain.systems

Class SystemsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • domain.game.Controller
      • domain.systems.SystemsController

  • public class SystemsController
extends Controller
    The main controller for the domain.systems package. This will control all the other classes within the package.
    See Also:
    Score, Wave

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init()
        Initialize the controller. Will initialize needed classes.

      • update

        public static void update()
        Update the controller. If playerReady is true, the Wave will begin.

        This checks for fragment destruction and when the Waves start and end.
